title: fried gurnard with broad bean, spinach and mint stew
description: This light stew uses the highly underrated fish gurnard, and is full of summer vegetables.
ingredients: 200g/7oz new potatoes, lightly scraped then quartered lengthways
200g/7oz frozen shelled and podded broad beans, thawed
10g/½ oz fresh mint leaves, sliced finely
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
4 x 175g/6oz gurnard fillets, pin boned, skin scored
